TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFormRegionFactory

summary.span: 定义一个接口，该接口创建实现 的类的实例。

span.span: Defines an interface that creates instances of classes that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口定义 Microsoft Office outlook 和 outlook 外接程序用来创建实现的类的实例的方法。 The interface defines methods that are used by Microsoft Office Outlook and the Outlook add-in to create instances of classes that implement . 向 outlook 外接程序项目添加 " **outlook 窗体区域**" 项时, Visual Studio 会将窗体区域工厂类添加到实现该接口的项目。When you add an **Outlook Form Region** item to an Outlook add-in project, Visual Studio adds a form region factory class to the project that implements the interface. 你还可以手动创建实现接口的窗体区域工厂类。You can also manually create a form region factory class that implements the interface. 如果执行此操作, 还必须创建实现的窗体区域类。If you do this, you must also create a form region class that implements . 在窗体区域工厂类的方法中创建窗体区域类的实例。Create an instance of the form region class in the method of the form region factory class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion CreateFormRegion(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion formRegion) cil managed

span.span: A that represents the native form region.

summary.span: 返回实现 接口的类的实例。

span.span: Returns an instance of a class that implements the interface.

returns.span: 实现 接口的类的实例。

span.span: An instance of a class that implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果手动创建窗体区域工厂类, 还必须创建实现接口的窗体区域类。If you manually create a form region factory class, you must also create a form region class that implements the interface. 在方法中创建窗体区域类的实例, 并将该对象返回到 Outlook。Create an instance of the form region class in the method and return the object to Outlook.

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] GetFormRegionStorage (object outlookItem, Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionMode formRegionMode, Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionSize formRegionSize);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetFormRegionStorage(object outlookItem, valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionMode formRegionMode, valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionSize formRegionSize) cil managed

param.name: outlookItem
param.span: 导致表单区域加载的 Outlook 项。

span.span: The Outlook item that caused the form region to load.

param.name: formRegionMode
param.span: 导致表单区域加载的 Outlook 项的模式。

span.span: The mode of the Outlook item that caused the form region to load.

param.span: 此模式由 枚举表示。

span.span: This mode is represented by the enumeration.

param.name: formRegionSize
param.span: 加载的表单区域的类型。

span.span: The type of form region being loaded.

param.span: 此模式由 枚举表示。

span.span: This mode is represented by the enumeration.

summary.span: 返回 Outlook 表单存储 (.ofs) 文件。

span.span: Returns an Outlook Form Storage (.ofs) file.

returns.span: 数组，包含 .ofs 文件的内容。

span.span: A array that contains the contents of the .ofs file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当窗体区域工厂的属性返回枚举值时, 才会调用此方法。This method is called only if the property of the form region factory returns the enumeration value.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示是否应为指定的 Microsoft Office Outlook 项显示表单区域。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the form region should appear for the specified Microsoft Office Outlook item.

returns.span: 一个 ，指示是否应为指定的 Outlook 项显示表单区域。

span.span: A that indicates whether the form region should appear for the specified Outlook item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果手动创建窗体区域工厂类, 则可以使用此方法阻止 Outlook 项显示窗体区域。If you manually create a form region factory class, you can use this method to prevent an Outlook item from displaying the form region.

summary.span: 获取工厂创建的表单区域的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of form region that the factory creates.

value.span: 一个字符串, 表示工厂创建的窗体区域的类型。

span.span: A string that represents the type of form region that the factory creates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果手动创建窗体区域工厂类, 则必须为此属性返回或。If you manually create a form region factory class, you must return either or for this property.

summary.span: 获取属性的集合，这些属性描述表单区域在 Microsoft Office Outlook 中的显示方式。

span.span: Gets a collection of properties that describe how the form region appears in Microsoft Office Outlook.

value.span: , 它表示属性的集合, 这些属性描述窗体区域在 Outlook 中的显示方式。

span.span: A that represents a collection of properties that describe how the form region appears in Outlook.
